t: Amazon.com: FiberFix Repair Wrap - Permanent Waterproof Repair Tape 100x Stronger than Duct Tape 1" (1 Roll) : Industrial & Scientific
s: FiberFix combines industrial-strength fibers and specialized resin into a repair wrap that hardens like steel—providing a permanent fix. Simply activate the repair wrap in water, wrap tightly around the broken object, and your item will be repaired within 10-15 minutes.
